profiles.name: Cookie
profiles.bio: Adventurous murloc who loves exploring and making friends. Always up for a challenge! 🐟🌲

profiles.name: Thrall
profiles.bio: Warchief of the Horde, powerful shaman, and protector of Azeroth. Working towards peace and unity. 🌩️🔨

profiles.name: Jaina Proudmoore
profiles.bio: Leader of the Kirin Tor, powerful mage, and advocate for peace. Making Azeroth a better place, one spell at a time. ✨📚

profiles.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
profiles.bio: Banshee Queen of the Forsaken, master archer, and cunning strategist. Reclaiming what was lost. 🏹🧟‍♀️

profiles.name: Varian Wrynn
profiles.bio: King of Stormwind, skilled warrior, and loving father. Fighting for the Alliance and a brighter future. ⚔️👑

profiles.name: Tyrande Whisperwind
profiles.bio: High Priestess of Elune, skilled huntress, and leader of the Night Elves. Guided by the light of Elune. 🌙🏹

profiles.name: Illidan Stormrage
profiles.bio: Demon hunter, master of the fel, and misunderstood hero. Fighting the Burning Legion to save Azeroth. 🔥🗡️

profiles.name: Arthas Menethil
profiles.bio: The Lich King, ruler of the Scourge, and master of Icecrown Citadel. Bringing cold and darkness to Azeroth. ❄️👑

profiles.name: Anduin Wrynn
profiles.bio: Prince of Stormwind, devoted priest, and aspiring leader. Learning from the best to protect Azeroth. 🙏📖

profiles.name: Jon Doe
profiles.bio: Mysterious maverick, pun enthusiast, and part-time ninja 🕶️. On a quest to discover the world's best dad jokes and hidden emojis 🕵️. #AnonymousAdventurer

tweets.text: Just got a new Doomhammer. It's so much lighter than the old one. #NewYearNewMe #Warcraft
Did you hear about the mage who always kept her polymorph spell up? She really had a sheep fetish! 🐑😂 @WarchiefThrall #WarcraftJokes #MageLife
Just played a game of 'Hide and Seek' with my fellow undead. I won, of course, they couldn't smell me coming! 🧟‍♂️ #UndeadHumor #Warcraft
I told Anduin not to play Hearthstone with @ArchmageJaina. He never listens! #Fatherhood #Warcraft
A priest, a druid, and a rogue walk into a bar. The bartender says, 'What's this, a Night Elf party?' 😄 #NightElfJokes #Warcraft
You are not prepared... for this joke! Why did the druid go to therapy? He had too many bear issues! 🐻 @HighPriestess #WarcraftJokes #YouAreNotPrepared
Knock knock. Who's there? Frostmourne. Frostmourne who? Frostmourne hungers... for more jokes! 😈 #LichKingLaughs #Warcraft
Just learned a new healing spell from @ArchmageJaina. I feel so powerful! 💪 #PriestLife #Warcraft
Just took a stroll around Icecrown Citadel. You could say it was... chilling. ❄️ #LichKingLife #Warcraft
Why did the Paladin fail his driving test? He couldn't stop using his Divine Shield! 😂 #PaladinJokes #Warcraft
I told Invincible to take a break today. Even undead horses need some rest! 💀🐎 #LichKingLife #Warcraft
Why did the Tauren bring string to the party? He wanted to have a good time and just couldn't... bear it without! 😂 #TaurenHumor #Warcraft
Had a great meeting with @HighPriestess today. The Horde and the Night Elves will work together for a better future! #Peace #Warcraft
Shaman Tip: When life gives you lemons, make a totem out of them! 🍋⚡ #ShamanWisdom #Warcraft
Why did the Frost Mage get a job at the ice cream shop? They had the perfect cone of cold! 🍦❄️ #MageHumor #Warcraft
Had an insightful conversation with @KingVarian today. Let's bring peace to Azeroth, one step at a time! 🕊️ #PeaceTalks #Warcraft
